trends: There has been one other sighting in Camden
There were no other sightings in Camden on or around January 15th 1974
Summary: Large craft lit up sky, hovering above high school, beings sighted, missing time, abduction.
divs: sighting details1974-or-1975: the witness was approx. 15 or 16 years old, while riding in a car with a friend in village of camden. they were riding away from town on dunbar rd. when an orange ball slightly larger than a golf ball hovered centered, 12" over the hood of the car. they became frightened, and turned around, heading back towards the high school on mill st.. when near the intersection of oswego st. the sky lit up and they first became aware of the ufo presence. a large ufo illuminated the immediate sky, trees, & complete surrounding area. it lit up a tree line approx. 150-200 yards away. it appeared to be hovering or sitting upon the high school roof, approx. 300 ft. distant. the object appeared to be the size of two semi-trailers long, about 100 ft. in length. the object appeared trapazoidal in shape with upward sloping sides, and a row of windows. there were 9 entities looking at them and turning their heads as if conversing. within one to two minutes, they became aware of two grey entities appearing at the driver side window, and two or three appearing at the the witness' passenger side window. one also stood at the front of the car holding a white glowing ball approx. 8-10 inches in dia. the entity held it in both hands with arms somewhat extended. the next thing the witness could immediately recall, was standing outside in the door of the car. he noticed what appeared to be a laser spot touching on his chest. not knowing, or remembering opening the car door, he looked up at the ship which was closer now. a grey entity stood up in a "roof hatch" at the top of the ship. he threw something out, and looked directly at the witness. the witness was scared and jumped back in the car, he and his friend fled the area. years later the witness relived this event in a dream\memory and recalled being dragged semi-concious through a doorway and placed naked on an exam table, or doctor's bench. the witness was terrified. he recalls a very sharp instrument being inserted up his nose, he could feel it penetrate into his sinus cavity. there were 5 or 6 entities surrounding him, and they began to take one of his eyes out. he tried to scream in pain but couldn't and one of the grey entities touched his head and shoulder area, and the pain seemed to stop.
